cont.entity_a: Better sound including simulated surround, good sound, sound quality is fine, sound quality is so-so, volume is low, surround sound is terrific.
cont.entity_b: Sound isn't hi fidelity, works great for listening to interviews, extremely muddy and muffled audio, good highs, mid and bass with an amp, decent sound quality, doesn't isolate outside noises well, heavy, slightly muffled sound quality, good sound reproduction.

cont.entity_a: Better fit, lightweight and comfortable, fits poorly, pressing on ears.
cont.entity_b: Very comfortable, no problem using them over hearing aids, extremely uncomfortable to wear for long periods, too heavy and tight.

cont.entity_a: Better battery life, proprietary battery used, battery lasts less than four hours.
Headphones are poorly constructed, with weak plastic joints, material is cheap, cheaply constructed.
cont.entity_b: Plastic covering the foam degrades over time, not sturdy, one channel stopped working quickly.

cont.entity_a: Headphones stopped working after a month, no problems with breakage or wear.
cont.entity_b: Cord broke after two and a half months.

Range.comm: Headphones have a pretty good range.

cont.entity_a: Headphones work great inside the home and out into the yard, the range is okay.
There is little or no sound leakage, static noise occurs when moving head.
cont.entity_b: Good sound cancellation, keeps sound inside the headphones well.

cont.entity_a: Reception cuts out when the phone rings.

cont.entity_b: Good quality sound, great for the price.
